content.text:
Here is my attempt at the task, wrapped in the specified output tags:

<OUTPUT_TEXT>
To support the development of training materials and technical manuals:

• Work with subject matter experts to gather and organize content
• Structure the information in a logical flow, broken into chapters and sections
• Write clear, concise text to explain concepts and procedures 
• Use diagrams, flowcharts, and images to visually convey information
• Ensure consistency in terminology, style, and formatting throughout 
• Have the materials reviewed by technical experts and end users
• Incorporate feedback and revise the materials as needed
• Publish the final manuals in print and/or digital formats
• Keep materials up-to-date with product changes and new information
</OUTPUT_TEXT>
